{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ice Path |image = [[File:Ice Path.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ice Path |tokens = 6,000 |location = Between Route 44 and 45, north of Blackthorn City. }} '''Ice Path''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 120,400 |- | Boss || 380,000 |}
